languages.text: {n}Лязг приближается. Он доносится сквозь вентиляционные решетки и пересохшие топливопроводы. Переборка под вашими ногами вибрирует. Они все ближе! Вы все яснее слышите психический гомон тварей, которые спешат к вам.{/n}

{n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лязг приближается. Он доносится сквозь вентиляционные решетки и пересохшие топливопроводы. Переборка под вашими ногами вибрирует. Они все ближе! Вы все яснее слышите психический гомон тварей, которые спешат к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The bulkhead under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! Clearer and clearer, you hear the psychic din of the abominations rushing towards you.{/n}

{n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The bulkhead under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! Clearer and clearer, you hear the psychic din of the abominations rushing towards you.{/n}

{n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

{n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

{n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El estruendo metálico se acerca. Proviene de los conductos de ventilación y la canalización de combustible reseca. La cubierta vibra bajo tus pies. ¡Se acercan! La algarada psíquica se vuelve cada vez más distinguible conforme las abominaciones corren hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El estruendo metálico se acerca. Proviene de los conductos de ventilación y la canalización de combustible reseca. La cubierta vibra bajo tus pies. ¡Se acercan! La algarada psíquica se vuelve cada vez más distinguible conforme las abominaciones corren hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}叮叮当当的声音越来越近。通风井与干涸的燃料管道上都传来了声音，你脚下的甲板也在震动，它们正在靠近！这些怪物离你越来越近，灵能方面的干扰也变得越来越明显。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}叮叮当当的声音越来越近。通风井与干涸的燃料管道上都传来了声音，你脚下的甲板也在震动，它们正在靠近！这些怪物离你越来越近，灵能方面的干扰也变得越来越明显。{/n}

languages.text: {n}金属音が近づいてくる。換気シャフトと枯渇した燃料ダクトから聞こえるようだ。足下のデッキが揺れた。音は近い！不穏な何かがこちらにどんどん近づくほど、胸のざわめきはますます騒がしくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}金属音が近づいてくる。換気シャフトと枯渇した燃料ダクトから聞こえるようだ。足下のデッキが揺れた。音は近い！不穏な何かがこちらにどんどん近づくほど、胸のざわめきはますます騒がしくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Klappern kommt näher. Es dringt aus den Lüftungsschächten und den ausgetrockneten Treibstoffrohren. Das Deck unter deinen Füßen vibriert. Sie nähern sich! Das psionische Getöse wird immer klarer, während die Abscheulichkeiten auf dich zustürmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Klappern kommt näher. Es dringt aus den Lüftungsschächten und den ausgetrockneten Treibstoffrohren. Das Deck unter deinen Füßen vibriert. Sie nähern sich! Das psionische Getöse wird immer klarer, während die Abscheulichkeiten auf dich zustürmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les bruits se rapprochent. Ils viennent des conduits d'aération et des canalisations où s'écoulait autrefois du carburant. Le pont sous vos pieds se met à vibrer. Ils ne sont plus loin ! Le vacarme psychique se fait de plus en plus distinct à mesure que les abominations se précipitent vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les bruits se rapprochent. Ils viennent des conduits d'aération et des canalisations où s'écoulait autrefois du carburant. Le pont sous vos pieds se met à vibrer. Ils ne sont plus loin ! Le vacarme psychique se fait de plus en plus distinct à mesure que les abominations se précipitent vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çınlama gittikçe yaklaşıyor. Havalandırma boşluklarından ve kurumuş yakıt borularından sesler geliyor. Ayağının altındaki güverte titriyor. Arayı kapatıyorlar! Menfur yaratıklar arayı kapatırken ruhsezi yankıları da ayırt edilebilir hâle geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The clanging is getting closer. It's coming from the ventilation shafts and dried-up fuel ducts. The deck under your feet vibrates. They're closing in! The psychic din grows more and more distinct as the abominations rush toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çınlama gittikçe yaklaşıyor. Havalandırma boşluklarından ve kurumuş yakıt borularından sesler geliyor. Ayağının altındaki güverte titriyor. Arayı kapatıyorlar! Menfur yaratıklar arayı kapatırken psişik yankılar da ayırt edilebilir hâle geliyor.{/n}
